short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Open a new tab, see new clip.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension is inspired by the google earth extensions that shows you each time a place on earth. In this one each time you open a new tab you see a short Dragon Ball Super clip. It also includes a Google search field.
